results.title: Attiuk
results.creator_credit: Rene Bonniere, Pierre Perrault and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: To understand the life of the Montagnais, you have to walk twelve days on snowshoes as far as Lake Musquaro in search of the caribou, following a dream contained within the skins of the drum that the elders patiently craft, like a canoe. The hunters hunt the caribou, which provide the skins for their drums which give them their dreams, which brings them the caribou.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Rene Bonniere, Pierre Perrault and National Film Board of Canada

results.title: Attack of the 50ft woman
results.creator_credit: Nathan Hertz, Bernard Woolner and Woolner Productions
results.brief_description: No one believes Nancy Archer has encountered a giant alien from outer space in the desert one night. The local sheriff and her doctor think she is suffering from hallucinations. Her husband, Harry, is openly having an affair and wants Nancy committed to an asylum so he can take her money and enjoy a life of lustful luxury. It soon becomes quite obvious Nancy is telling the truth when she grows into a 50ft woman who soon becomes a towering menace as she seeks out her husband and his lover to get even.

results.title: Asthma in the under 5's
results.creator_credit: Paul Roy, Jenny Ainge, Film Australia and Iguana Films (AU)
results.brief_description: Noni Hazelhurst presents interviews with parents and child care professionals who explore the difficulties in diagnosis and symptoms which suggest asthma. Provides a definition of asthma, discusses common triggers, asthma severity and outlines a six point management plan. 1. Assess severity 2. Achieve best lung function 3. Maintain best lung function 4. Optimise medications 5. Develop an action plan 6. Educate child and family and review regularly. Briefly addresses treatment strategies including medication types and preventative agents. Similarly, the role of support groups and the benefits of swimming classes. Accompanied by 4p. of Supporting Notes.

results.title: Asthma
results.creator_credit: Pat Phillips, Marie Meyrick and British Medical Television
results.brief_description: Asthma is the most common human ailment except for cold and flu. This excellent and informative video explains the physical and psychological effects of the condition, as well as investigating the range of treatments available for sufferers of asthma. Interviews with health professionals and people living with asthma stress the seriousness of the condition but the video makes clear that with proper treatment, medication and exercise the asthma sufferer can achieve a happy and active life. Produced by medical professionals, this video dispels myths about the disease and treats the asthma sufferer with intelligence and dignity.

results.title: Asterix vs Caesar
results.creator_credit: Gaetan Brizzi, Goscinny, Paul Brizzi and Gaumont
results.brief_description: These Romans are crazy! Now they’ve miraculously captured two Gauls and sent them to a Legion camp in the furthest region of the Empire, the Sahara Desert. Asterix and Obelix set off to rescue their Gaulish comrades by joining the legion, only to find that they have already escaped. The search continues and our heroes end up in the Colosseum facing Romans, gladiators and lions galore. All your favourites are back in another Gaulish adventure. Asterix, Obelix, Dogmatix, Chief Vitalstatistix, the druid Getafix, Panacea, and more! Based on the popular books by Goscinny and Uderzo.

results.title: Asterix the Gaul
results.brief_description: Asterix, the adventurous hero is the cunning little warrior to whom all perilous missions are immediately entrusted. Thanks to the magic potion of the Druid, he is famed for his superhuman strength. As if that were not enough, his mighty friend, Obelix is always ready to drop everything to go off on a new adventure with Asterix, although he is never allowed to have a portion of the magic potion because he fell into it when he was a baby. Wherever excitement and danger reigns, you can be sure that our intrepid pair will be in the thick of it. So Romans beware, here comes Asterix the Gaul. Based on the popular books by Goscinny and Underzo.

results.title: Asterix and the big fight
results.creator_credit: Philippe Grimond, Nicolas Pesques, ExtraFilm Produktion and Gaumont
results.brief_description: In this, the sixth animated Asterix feature, Asterix, Obelix and their faithful canine Dogmatix are left alone to defend their village against the Romans after the rest of the villagers have fled from a terrible thunderstorm. Unfortunately for them the druid Getafix has lost his memory after being accidently knocked unconscious with a menhir by Obelix and is unable to remember the formula for the potion that gives Asterix the superhuman strength he relies on to defeat the Romans. Based on the popular books by Goscinny and Underzo.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Philippe Grimond, Nicolas Pesques, ExtraFilm Produktion and Gaumont

results.title: Assertive team communication
results.creator_credit: Cathy Beitz, Tracy Riddiford and Our Bizniss Productions
results.brief_description: This video package is designed for a half day group training session on assertive communication within a team environment. The manual provides background notes, suggested activities and pages to copy for overhead transparencies and the kit is flexible enough to apply to any work environment.

results.title: Assassin of youth
results.creator_credit: Elmer Clifton, Leo McCarthy and B C M Productions
results.brief_description: Joan is a good-natured teenager who, along with her sister, is set to receive her grandmother’s inheritance. When her grandmother is run over by a driver under the influence of marijuana, a reporter is sent to investigate. Meanwhile Joan’s scheming cousin Linda, intent on receiving the money herself, determines to have Joan dis-inherited by ruining her clean-cut reputation. The reporter on the case, who has fallen for Joan, discovers that Linda is a drug peddler and that Joan’s sister has become addicted to marijuana. “Assassin of youth” is an anti-drug teen propaganda movie typical of the 1930s. A fairly stilted and straightforward morality drama, this film has an almost transparent agenda, is patriarchal, traditionalist and simplistic in its politics. Nevertheless the film is a curiosity that is telling about the values of the era and perceived threat that teenagers under the influence posed to the status quo. Cast includes Luana Walters, Arthur Gardner, Fay McKenzie, Michael Owen, Dorothy Short, Dorothy Vaughan, Earl Dwire.

results.title: At the front: 1939-1945
results.creator_credit: Annice Vass and National Film and Sound Archive of Australia
results.brief_description: A compilation of Cinesound and Movietone Newsreels featuring footage from World War II including Prime Minister Robert Menzies’ declaration of war in 1939, the AIF at Benghazi, the Coral Sea Victory, the Australian Women’s Army Service and other momentous events including famous war footage shot by Damian Parer.
